title: Tutorial
description: This is literally a [tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b8YUfee_pzc) I followed pretty much line by line to try to become more familiar with Unity

title: Platformer
description: A scene I made while learning how to make my own assets. As of writing, you can run around and collect 3 coins (with sound effects and animation!) It's not much, but this project was mainly for me to play around with coding in unity and making my own assets.

title: Terragrow
description: My first game jam! Terragrow was made across 3 days with a sum of 18 hours of cumalitive work put into coding and game dev! Made in collaboration with my friend; he did all the sound and music while I did all the art and coding. Terragrow turned out much better than I could have ever hoped, especially for a first playable game. Though the mechanics are a bit fincky, I'm satisfied at the custom art and music we were able to make in such a short time as well as the implemntation of logic through Unity and C#!
